  • Drug :: EMOLLIENT CREAMS AND OINTMENTS, PARAFFIN-CONTAINING

Cream

Additional inactive ingredients are; Benzyl alcohol, cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), chlorocresol, disodium edetate, fragrances, hydroxybenzoates (parabens), polysorbates, propylene glycol, sorbic acid, lanolin,
